content: **knitted double head-band in drops air the piece is worked in the round with rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ai-449 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m/l - xl fits head-size approx 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm height 11 cm **yarn** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50-50-100 g colour 42-pistachio ice cream/36-light blue/08-light pink **needles** drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
